product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Chicken and Rice- 2 Servings
long_description: White rice and mixed vegetables in a chicken gravy will have you feeling at home on the trail! Easy to prepare-just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand a few minutes, and serve. All-natural entree has no artificial colors, flavors, additives or preservatives-vitamin fortified. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. May contain traces of peanuts and/or tree nuts. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: White rice and mixed vegetables in a chicken gravy will have you feeling at home on the trail!
